author: Tribune News Service
title: 10 players the Ravens could target in free agency, from big names to bargains

sentence: There are several appealing center options in free agency, including Ryan Jensen of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, Ben Jones of the Tennessee Titans and Brian Allen of the Los Angeles Rams.
author: Alex Ballentine
title: NFL Starters Who Could Have Their Jobs Stolen by Free-Agent Signings in 2022

sentence: Both have free agents of their own to worry about, whether it's edge-rusher Von Miller and center Brian Allen in Los Angeles or linebacker De'Vondre Campbell and cornerback Rasul Douglas in Green Bay.
author: Gary Davenport
title: Tom Brady Is Back, but the Buccaneers Are Far from Super Bowl Favorites

sentence: Staying put are Tampa Bay center Ryan Jensen, a key protector of Tom Brady; safeties Devin McCourty with the Patriots and Quandre Diggs with the Seahawks; All-Pro kick returner Braxton Berrios with the Jets; defensive end Emmanuel Ogbah with the Dolphins; linebacker Preston Smith with the Packers; center Brian Allen and tackle Joseph Noteboom with the Rams; center Ben Jones and tight end Geoff Swaim with the Titans.
author: Associated Press
title: NFL free agency roundup: Let the mostly unofficial dealing begin

sentence: Staying put are Tampa Bay center Ryan Jensen, a key protector of the no-longer-retired Tom Brady; RB James Conner and QB Colt McCoy with the Cardinals; safeties Devin McCourty with the Patriots and Quandre Diggs with the Seahawks, who also retained tight end Will Dissly; All-Pro kick returner Braxton Berrios with the Jets; defensive end Emmanuel Ogbah with the Dolphins; linebacker Preston Smith with the Packers; center Brian Allen and tackle Joseph Noteboom with the Rams; center Mitch Morse with the Bills; linebacker Alex Anzalone with the Lions; center Ben Jones and tight end Geoff Swaim with the Titans; and offensive tackle Chuks Okorafor with the Steelers.
author: BARRY WILNER AP Pro Football Writer
title: NFL free agency: Let the dealing begin, mostly unofficial
